description: This trail presents the opportunity for a four lake tour: Vista, Arnica, Upper Twin, and Lower Twin.  The track takes you to the Banff backcountry campground TW7.  You have to reserve beforehand.    It is a beautiful hike, with quite a climb between Vista and Arnica lakes.
directions: Off of Highway 93 in Banff nat'l park.  The trail head is the Vista Lake/Twin Lakes trailhead.  It is almost to British Columbia.  If you cross the border you have gone too far.
title: Twin Lakes - Banff backcountry cmpgrnd TW7
